Pro-Graduate Diploma is Hospitality & Tourism

COURSE DURATION:

  • 1 Year

  

ADMISSION REQUIREMENTS:

  • You must have successfully completed the CTH Advanced Diploma in Hospitality and Tourism Management, or have been granted an exemption from this.

 

COURSE STRUCTURE: 

  • Four  Modules must be completed
  • You’ll write a 3 hour exam for each module or be given an assignment.

 

COURSE CONTENT:

  • Module One: Emerging Issues in the Tourism Industry
  • Module Two: The Strategic Impact of the Business Environment

Choose Two of the Following:

  • Business Strategy for Hospitality and Tourism
  • Managing Events for Hospitality and Tourism
  • Quality Management for Hospitality and Tourism
  • Management Strategies for Hospitality and Tourism

 

CAREER PATH:

  • Apply for positions as:
    • Food and Beverage Manager
    • Travel Agency Manager
    • Front-of-House Manager
    • Banqueting Manager
    • Tour Operations Manager
    • Training Assistant Manager
    • Events Manager
    • Guest Relations Manager

 

PROGRESS OPPORTUNITIES:

  • Progress to our Post-Graduate Diploma or gain access to your Masters Degree at selected Universities.:

 

OTHER MANAGEMENT PROGRAMMES IN HOSPITALITY AND TOURISM.

  • Certificate in Hospitality & Tourism
  • Diploma in Hospitality & Tourism
  • Advanced Diploma in Hospitality & Tourism
  • Pro-Graduate Diploma in Hospitality & Tourism
  • Post-Graduate Diploma in Hospitality & Tourism
